original_title: Sherrod Brown launches 2026 Ohio Senate comeback bid after 2024 loss | Fox News
article_summary: Former Ohio Senator Sherrod Brown has announced his 2026 bid to reclaim his Senate seat, challenging Republican incumbent Jon Husted. Brown, a longtime advocate for workers, faces criticism from the National Republican Senatorial Committee as a "liberal sell-out." Ohio, once a general election battleground, has leaned more Republican in recent years.</s>
